Class CardsClient.ClientThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • CardsClient.ClientThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Enclosing class:
    CardsClient

    class CardsClient.ClientThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    ClientThread is the thread that keeps the GUI updated

                               int number)

        Parameters:

        number - int *magic* number that fits the card's wrap
